#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	
	while(test--){		
		long long a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		
		long long d=__gcd(a,b);
		while(a%d==0){
			d=__gcd(b,d);
			b=b/d;
			
//			cout<<d<<" "<<b<<endl;
			if(d==1)    break;
		}
		
		if(b==1) cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
}
